ResearchProjectDef.label: algae farm
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build algae farms in shallow water.

ResearchProjectDef.label: relay station
ResearchProjectDef.description: You have found a way to get power cables down to the wreckage on the ocean floor. It seems like a part is still active and can be used for power generation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: retrieval station
ResearchProjectDef.description: Someone offered to dive down to the wreckage to get some ressouces. As it turns out there are some around down there. If you find a way to get them to the surface this is a stable but slow way to provide basic things.
